original_title: Tarry-Dan Tarry-Dan Scarey Old Spooky Man
overview: When he finds himself plagued with nightmares about a historic battle fought on the site of the village he lives in, delinquent Cornish teenager Jonah Grattan becomes obsessed with a potential link to a local homeless man.
title: Tarry-Dan Tarry-Dan Scarey Old Spooky Man
